verses.verse: ( The Descendants of Judah) בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> bə·nê The descendants יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> yə·hū·ḏāh of Judah: פֶּ֧רֶץ <WH6557> pe·reṣ Perez, חֶצְר֛וֹן <WH2696> ḥeṣ·rō·wn Hezron, וְכַרְמִ֖י <WH3756> wə·ḵar·mî Carmi, וְח֥וּר <WH2354> wə·ḥūr Hur, וְשׁוֹבָֽל׃ <WH7732> wə·šō·w·ḇāl and Shobal.

וּרְאָיָ֤ה <WH7211> ū·rə·’ā·yāh Reaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> ḇen- son שׁוֹבָל֙ <WH7732> šō·w·ḇāl of Shobal הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> hō·w·lîḏ was the father of אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - יַ֔חַת <WH3189> ya·ḥaṯ Jahath, וְיַ֣חַת <WH3189> wə·ya·ḥaṯ and Jahath הֹלִ֔יד <WH3205> hō·lîḏ was the father of אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - אֲחוּמַ֖י <WH267> ’ă·ḥū·may Ahumai וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - לָ֑הַד <WH3855> lā·haḏ and Lahad. אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> ’êl·leh These מִשְׁפְּח֥וֹת <WH4940> miš·pə·ḥō·wṯ were the clans הַצָּֽרְעָתִֽי׃ס <WH6882> haṣ·ṣā·rə·‘ā·ṯî of the Zorathites.

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> wə·’êl·leh These אֲבִ֣י <WH1> ’ă·ḇî [were] the sons ( LXX (see also Vulgate); Hebrew These were of the father) עֵיטָ֔ם <WH5862> ‘ê·ṭām of Etam: יִזְרְעֶ֥אל <WH3157> yiz·rə·‘el Jezreel, וְיִשְׁמָ֖א <WH3457> wə·yiš·mā Ishma, וְיִדְבָּ֑שׁ <WH3031> wə·yiḏ·bāš and Idbash. וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> wə·šêm was named אֲחוֹתָ֖ם <WH269> ’ă·ḥō·w·ṯām And their sister הַצְלֶלְפּֽוֹנִי׃ <WH6753> haṣ·lel·pō·w·nî Hazzelelponi.

וּפְנוּאֵל֙ <WH6439> ū·p̄ə·nū·’êl Penuel אֲבִ֣י <WH1> ’ă·ḇî was the father ( Or the founder; also in verses 5, 12, 14, 17, 18, and possibly elsewhere) גְדֹ֔ר <WH1446> ḡə·ḏōr of Gedor, וְעֵ֖זֶר <WH5829> wə·‘ê·zer and Ezer אֲבִ֣י <WH1> ’ă·ḇî was the father of חוּשָׁ֑ה <WH2364> ḥū·šāh Hushah. אֵ֤לֶּה <WH428> ’êl·leh These בְנֵי־ <WH1121> ḇə·nê- were the descendants חוּר֙ <WH2354> ḥūr of Hur, בְּכ֣וֹר <WH1060> bə·ḵō·wr the firstborn אֶפְרָ֔תָה <WH672> ’ep̄·rā·ṯāh of Ephrathah אֲבִ֖י <WH1> ’ă·ḇî and the father בֵּ֥ית <WH1035> bêṯ vvv לָֽחֶם׃ <WH1035> lā·ḥem of Bethlehem.

וּלְאַשְׁחוּר֙ <WH806> ū·lə·’aš·ḥūr Ashhur אֲבִ֣י <WH1> ’ă·ḇî the father of תְק֔וֹעַ <WH8620> ṯə·qō·w·a‘ Tekoa הָי֖וּ <WH1961> hā·yū had שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> šə·tê two נָשִׁ֑ים <WH802> nā·šîm wives, חֶלְאָ֖ה <WH2458> ḥel·’āh Helah וְנַעֲרָֽה׃ <WH5292> wə·na·‘ă·rāh and Naarah.

וַתֵּ֨לֶד <WH3205> wat·tê·leḏ bore ל֤וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) to him נַעֲרָה֙ 5292 N-proper-fs ( na·‘ă·rāh) Naarah אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - אֲחֻזָּ֣ם 275 N-proper-ms ( ’ă·ḥuz·zām) Ahuzzam, וְאֶת־ 853 Conj-w│DirObjM ( wə·’eṯ-) - חֵ֔פֶר 2660 N-proper-ms ( ḥê·p̄er) Hepher, וְאֶת־ 853 Conj-w│DirObjM ( wə·’eṯ-) - תֵּימְנִ֖י 8488 N-proper-ms ( tê·mə·nî) Temeni, וְאֶת־ 853 Conj-w│DirObjM ( wə·’eṯ-) - הָאֲחַשְׁתָּרִ֑י 326 Art│N-proper-ms ( hā·’ă·ḥaš·tā·rî) and Haahashtari. אֵ֖לֶּה 428 Pro-cp ( ’êl·leh) These בְּנֵ֥י 1121 N-mpc ( bə·nê) were the descendants נַעֲרָֽה׃ 5292 N-proper-fs ( na·‘ă·rāh) of Naarah.

וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> ū·ḇə·nê The sons חֶלְאָ֑ה <WH2458> ḥel·’āh of Helah צֶ֥רֶת <WH6889> ṣe·reṯ [were] Zereth, יִצְחָר <WH3328> yiṣ·ḥå̄r Zohar, ( Alternate MT reading; the other alternate (see also Vulgate) reads Izhar.) וְאֶתְנָֽן׃ <WH869> wə·’eṯ·nān Ethnan,

וְק֣וֹץ <WH6976> wə·qō·wṣ and Koz, הוֹלִ֔יד <WH3205> hō·w·lîḏ who was the father of אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - עָנ֖וּב <WH6036> ‘ā·nūḇ Anub וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- and הַצֹּבֵבָ֑ה <WH6637> haṣ·ṣō·ḇê·ḇāh Zobebah וּמִשְׁפְּח֥וֹת <WH4940> ū·miš·pə·ḥō·wṯ and of the clans אֲחַרְחֵ֖ל <WH316> ’ă·ḥar·ḥêl of Aharhel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- son הָרֽוּם׃ <WH2037> hā·rūm of Harum.

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> way·hî was ( The Prayer of Jabez) יַעְבֵּ֔ץ <WH3258> ya‘·bêṣ Now Jabez נִכְבָּ֖ד <WH3513> niḵ·bāḏ more honorable מֵאֶחָ֑יו <WH251> mê·’e·ḥāw than his brothers. וְאִמּ֗וֹ <WH517> wə·’im·mōw His mother קָרְאָ֨ה <WH7121> qā·rə·’āh had named him שְׁמ֤וֹ <WH8034> šə·mōw ... יַעְבֵּץ֙ <WH3258> ya‘·bêṣ Jabez, ( Jabez sounds like the Hebrew for pain or distress.) לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> lê·mōr saying, כִּ֥י <WH3588> kî “ Because יָלַ֖דְתִּי <WH3205> yā·laḏ·tî I bore [him] בְּעֹֽצֶב׃ <WH6090> bə·‘ō·ṣeḇ in pain. ”

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> way·yiq·rā called out יַ֠עְבֵּץ <WH3258> ya‘·bêṣ And Jabez לֵאלֹהֵ֨י <WH430> lê·lō·hê to the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl of Israel לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> lê·mōr ..., אִם־ <WH518> ’im- “ If only בָּרֵ֨ךְ <WH1288> bā·rêḵ You would bless me תְּבָרֲכֵ֜נִי <WH1288> tə·ḇā·ră·ḵê·nî ... וְהִרְבִּ֤יתָ <WH7235> wə·hir·bî·ṯā and enlarge אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - גְּבוּלִי֙ <WH1366> gə·ḇū·lî my territory! וְהָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> wə·hā·yə·ṯāh be יָדְךָ֙ <WH3027> yā·ḏə·ḵā May Your hand עִמִּ֔י <WH5973> ‘im·mî with me וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> wə·‘ā·śî·ṯā and keep me מֵּרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> mê·rā·‘āh from harm, לְבִלְתִּ֣י <WH1115> lə·ḇil·tî so that I will be free עָצְבִּ֑י <WH6087> ‘ā·ṣə·bî from pain. ” וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> way·yā·ḇê granted אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm And God אֵ֥ת <WH853> ’êṯ of [Jabez]. אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- - שָׁאָֽל׃ <WH7592> šā·’āl the request

( More Descendants of Judah) וּכְל֥וּב <WH3620> ū·ḵə·lūḇ Chelub אֲחִֽי־ <WH251> ’ă·ḥî- the brother שׁוּחָ֖ה <WH7746> šū·ḥāh of Shuhah הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> hō·w·lîḏ was the father of אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - מְחִ֑יר <WH4243> mə·ḥîr Mehir, ה֖וּא <WH1931> hū who אֲבִ֥י <WH1> ’ă·ḇî was the father אֶשְׁתּֽוֹן׃ <WH850> ’eš·tō·wn of Eshton.

וְאֶשְׁתּ֗וֹן <WH850> wə·’eš·tō·wn Eshton הוֹלִ֞יד <WH3205> hō·w·lîḏ was the father of אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - בֵּ֤ית <WH1051> bêṯ vvv רָפָא֙ <WH1051> rā·p̄ā Beth-rapha, וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - פָּסֵ֔חַ <WH6454> pā·sê·aḥ of Paseah, וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - תְּחִנָּ֖ה <WH8468> tə·ḥin·nāh and of Tehinnah אֲבִ֣י <WH1> ’ă·ḇî the father עִ֣יר <WH5892> ‘îr vvv נָחָ֑שׁ <WH5904> nā·ḥāš of Ir-nahash. אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> ’êl·leh These אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH582> ’an·šê were the men רֵכָֽה׃ס <WH7397> rê·ḵāh of Recah.

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> ū·ḇə·nê The sons קְנַ֔ז <WH7073> qə·naz of Kenaz: עָתְנִיאֵ֖ל <WH6274> ‘ā·ṯə·nî·’êl Othniel וּשְׂרָיָ֑ה <WH8304> ū·śə·rā·yāh and Seraiah. וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> ū·ḇə·nê The sons עָתְנִיאֵ֖ל <WH6274> ‘ā·ṯə·nî·’êl of Othniel: חֲתַֽת׃ <WH2867> ḥă·ṯaṯ Hathath and Meonothai. ( Vulgate and some LXX; Hebrew does not include and Meonothai.)

וּמְעוֹנֹתַ֖י <WH4587> ū·mə·‘ō·w·nō·ṯay Meonothai הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> hō·w·lîḏ was the father of אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - עָפְרָ֑ה <WH6084> ‘ā·p̄ə·rāh Ophrah, וּשְׂרָיָ֗ה <WH8304> ū·śə·rā·yāh and Seraiah הוֹלִ֤יד <WH3205> hō·w·lîḏ was the father of אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - יוֹאָב֙ <WH3097> yō·w·’āḇ Joab, אֲבִי֙ <WH1> ’ă·ḇî the father גֵּ֣יא <WH1516> gê of those living in חֲרָשִׁ֔ים <WH2798> ḥă·rā·šîm Ge-harashim, כִּ֥י <WH3588> kî [which was given this name] because חֲרָשִׁ֖ים <WH2796> ḥă·rā·šîm craftsmen. ( Literally Ge-harashim, for they were craftsmen. The Hebrew Ge-harashim means valley of craftsmen.) הָיֽוּ׃פ <WH1961> hā·yū [its people] were

וּבְנֵי֙ <WH1121> ū·ḇə·nê The sons כָּלֵ֣ב <WH3612> kā·lêḇ of Caleb בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- son יְפֻנֶּ֔ה <WH3312> yə·p̄un·neh of Jephunneh: עִ֥ירוּ <WH5900> ‘î·rū Iru, אֵלָ֖ה <WH425> ’ê·lāh Elah, וָנָ֑עַם <WH5277> wā·nā·‘am and Naam. וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> ū·ḇə·nê The son ( Hebrew sons) אֵלָ֖ה <WH425> ’ê·lāh of Elah: וּקְנַֽז׃ <WH7073> ū·qə·naz Kenaz.

וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> ū·ḇə·nê The sons יְהַלֶּלְאֵ֑ל <WH3094> yə·hal·lel·’êl of Jehallelel: זִ֣יף <WH2128> zîp̄ Ziph, וְזִיפָ֔ה <WH2129> wə·zî·p̄āh Ziphah, תִּירְיָ֖א <WH8493> tî·rə·yā Tiria, וַאֲשַׂרְאֵֽל׃ <WH840> wa·’ă·śar·’êl and Asarel.

וּבֶן־ <WH1121> ū·ḇen- The sons עֶזְרָ֔ה <WH5834> ‘ez·rāh of Ezrah: יֶ֥תֶר <WH3500> ye·ṯer Jether, וּמֶ֖רֶד <WH4778> ū·me·reḏ Mered, וְעֵ֣פֶר <WH6081> wə·‘ê·p̄er Epher, וְיָל֑וֹן <WH3210> wə·yā·lō·wn and Jalon. וַתַּ֙הַר֙ <WH2029> wat·ta·har And [Mered’s wife Bithiah] gave birth ( Literally she gave birth) אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - מִרְיָ֣ם <WH4813> mir·yām to Miriam, וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - שַׁמַּ֔י <WH8060> šam·may Shammai, וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - יִשְׁבָּ֖ח <WH3431> yiš·bāḥ and Ishbah אֲבִ֥י <WH1> ’ă·ḇî the father אֶשְׁתְּמֹֽעַ׃ <WH851> ’eš·tə·mō·a‘ of Eshtemoa.

וְאִשְׁתּ֣וֹ <WH802> wə·’iš·tōw wife, הַיְהֻדִיָּ֗ה <WH3057> hay·hu·ḏî·yāh a Judean ( Or Judahite) יָלְדָ֞ה <WH3205> yā·lə·ḏāh who gave birth to אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - יֶ֨רֶד <WH3382> ye·reḏ Jered אֲבִ֤י <WH1> ’ă·ḇî the father גְדוֹר֙ <WH1446> ḡə·ḏō·wr of Gedor, וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - חֶ֙בֶר֙ <WH2268> ḥe·ḇer Heber אֲבִ֣י <WH1> ’ă·ḇî the father שׂוֹכ֔וֹ <WH7755> śō·w·ḵōw of Soco, וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - יְקֽוּתִיאֵ֖ל <WH3354> yə·qū·ṯî·’êl and Jekuthiel אֲבִ֣י <WH1> ’ă·ḇî the father זָנ֑וֹחַ <WH2182> zā·nō·w·aḥ of Zanoah. וְאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> wə·’êl·leh These בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> bə·nê were the children בִּתְיָ֣ה <WH1332> biṯ·yāh Bithiah. ( This statement is at the end of verse 18 in the Hebrew.) בַת־ <WH1323> ḇaṯ- daughter פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> par·‘ōh of Pharaoh’s אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - לָקַ֖ח <WH3947> lā·qaḥ took מָֽרֶד׃ס <WH4778> mā·reḏ Mered also

וּבְנֵי֙ <WH1121> ū·ḇə·nê The sons אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> ’ê·šeṯ wife, הֽוֹדִיָּ֔ה <WH1941> hō·w·ḏî·yāh of Hodiah’s אֲח֣וֹת <WH269> ’ă·ḥō·wṯ the sister נַ֔חַם <WH5163> na·ḥam of Naham, אֲבִ֥י <WH1> ’ă·ḇî [were] the fathers קְעִילָ֖ה <WH7084> qə·‘î·lāh of Keilah הַגַּרְמִ֑י <WH1636> hag·gar·mî the Garmite וְאֶשְׁתְּמֹ֖עַ <WH851> wə·’eš·tə·mō·a‘ and of Eshtemoa הַמַּעֲכָתִֽי׃ <WH4602> ham·ma·‘ă·ḵā·ṯî the Maacathite. ( Or were the father of Keilah the Garmite, and Eshtemoa the Maacathite)

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> ū·ḇə·nê The sons שִׁימ֔וֹן <WH7889> šî·mō·wn of Shimon: אַמְנ֣וֹן <WH550> ’am·nō·wn Amnon, וְרִנָּ֔ה <WH7441> wə·rin·nāh Rinnah, בֶּן־ <WH1135> ben- vvv חָנָ֖ן <WH1135> ḥā·nān Ben-hanan, וְתוֹלוֹן <WH8436> wə·ṯō·lōn and Tilon. וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> ū·ḇə·nê The descendants יִשְׁעִ֔י <WH3469> yiš·‘î of Ishi: זוֹחֵ֖ת <WH2105> zō·w·ḥêṯ Zoheth וּבֶן־ <WH1132> ū·ḇen- vvv זוֹחֵֽת׃ <WH1132> zō·w·ḥêṯ and Ben-zoheth.

בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> bə·nê The sons שֵׁלָ֣ה <WH7956> šê·lāh of Shelah בֶן־ <WH1121> ḇen- son יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> yə·hū·ḏāh of Judah: עֵ֚ר <WH6147> ‘êr Er אֲבִ֣י <WH1> ’ă·ḇî the father לֵכָ֔ה <WH3922> lê·ḵāh of Lecah, וְלַעְדָּ֖ה <WH3935> wə·la‘·dāh Laadah אֲבִ֣י <WH1> ’ă·ḇî the father מָרֵשָׁ֑ה <WH4762> mā·rê·šāh of Mareshah וּמִשְׁפְּח֛וֹת <WH4940> ū·miš·pə·ḥō·wṯ and the clans בֵּית־ <WH1004> bêṯ- at Beth-ashbea עֲבֹדַ֥ת <WH5656> ‘ă·ḇō·ḏaṯ workers הַבֻּ֖ץ <WH948> hab·buṣ of the linen לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> lə·ḇêṯ ... אַשְׁבֵּֽעַ׃ <WH791> ’aš·bê·a‘ ...,
